div.h2: US Core Condition Category Extension Codes

div.p: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core profiles. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and US Core value sets.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/condition-category defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patients problems as identified by the provider(s). Items on the provider’s problem list
Additional health concerns from other stakeholders which are outside the provider’s problem list.
